original_text: Some people are in great danger. You must save them from the fire of God's punishment. Also be kind to people who have done wicked and disgusting things. But be careful! Do not let their sins make you bad too.
korean_text: 또 어떤 자를 불에서 끌어내어 구원하라 또 어떤 자를 그 육체로 더럽힌 옷까지도 미워하되 두려움으로 긍휼히 여기라

sentences.original_text: Some people are in great danger.
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 큰 위험에 처해 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: from the fire of God's punishment.
to people who have done wicked and disgusting things.
Do not let their sins make you bad too.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 죄가 당신도 나쁘게 만들게 하지 마세요.
